LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld.label: 复古门
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld.description: 分隔房间。必须手动打开，这会减慢人们通过的速度。减速程度取决于门由什么材料构成。
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld_Blueprint.label: antique door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld_Frame.label: antique door (building)
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.RGK_Door.label: 门
LanguageData.RGK_Door.description: 分隔房间。必须手动打开，这会减慢人们通过的速度。减速程度取决于门由什么材料构成。

LanguageData.RGK_Door_Frame.label: fence door (building)
LanguageData.RGK_Door_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.

LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame_Frame.description: It is a frame to decorate the door.
